message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm offering it to you for $1,800,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth and offers a fair starting point for our negotiations.
I appreciate the value of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than this.

Bob, I appreciate you coming to the table and recognizing the value of this product.  While your offer is generous, I'm aiming for a price closer to $1,600,000. This reflects the true potential and scarcity of what I'm offering. Would you be willing to consider a figure in that range?
I understand you're looking for a price closer to $1,600,000, but I'm afraid I'm still at $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any higher.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm ready to make this work, so I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000. However, I need to be transparent â€“ this is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll need to explore other options.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still at $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
